name: Animals as Leaders
description: '''Animals as Leaders''' is an American [[instrumental]] [[progressive metal]] band from [[Washington D.C.]] Since 2012, the band has consisted of [[Tosin Abasi]] (lead guitar), Javier Reyes (rhythm guitar), and [[Matt Garstka]] (drums), having originated in 2007 as a solo project by Abasi. They are a prominent band within the [[djent]] scene. [[Prosthetic Records]] released the band's [[Animals as Leaders (album)|eponymous debut album]] in 2009. They have since released the albums ''[[Weightless (Animals as Leaders album)|Weightless]]'' (2011), ''[[The Joy of Motion]]'' (2014), ''[[The Madness of Many]]'' (2016), and ''[[Parrhesia (album)|Parrhesia]]'' (2022).
